method.name: getGeneratedSourceDirectories
method.description: * The set of generated source directories. This is a subset of those directories returned by {@link #getSourceDirectories()}. * * @since 2.2

method.name: getGeneratedTestDirectories
method.description: * The set of generated test directories. This is a subset of those directories returned by {@link #getTestDirectories()}. * * @since 2.2

method.name: getTestDirectories
method.description: * The set of test source directories.

property.name: generatedSourceDirectories
property.description: * The set of generated source directories. This is a subset of those directories returned by {@link #getSourceDirectories()}. * * @since 2.2

property.name: generatedTestDirectories
property.description: * The set of generated test directories. This is a subset of those directories returned by {@link #getTestDirectories()}. * * @since 2.2

property.name: testDirectories
property.description: * The set of test source directories.
